column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////You would think this is something you could pass up and well I thought so too until I unexpectedly had one in my box. Like all the croissants (with the exception of the fruit croissant)
column4: butteriest croissant you'll ever have and you won't be able to stop. The layers are so thin and it's like eating a buttery cloud. I keep saying buttery because you'll 1) taste it and 2) feel it all over your lips during and after. You won't need chapstick for the rest of the day.
